project.name: Documentation Sprint
project.description: Demo project for content team workflow

tasks.title: Write API documentation for /users endpoint
tasks.description: Create comprehensive API docs including parameters, request/response examples, error codes, and authentication requirements.

tasks.title: Create getting started tutorial
tasks.description: Write user-friendly tutorial for new users explaining how to create their first project and get started with the platform.

tasks.title: Review and edit all documentation
tasks.description: Review both the API docs and tutorial for clarity, grammar, consistency, and overall quality. Provide constructive feedback.
